import React, { useEffect, Fragment } from "react"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import { FetchCartItems } from "../../actions/cart"; // import "./cart.css"; const Cart = () => { const token = useSelector((state) => state.auth.token); const browserHistory = useHistory(); const dispatch = useDispatch(); useEffect(() => { if (!token) { browserHistory.push("/login"); } dispatch(FetchCartItems()); }, [token, browserHistory, FetchCartItems, dispatch]); const { products, subTotal, loading } = useSelector((state) => state.cart); console.log(products); if (products.length > 0 && !loading) { return (
